Sequence Information.Peptide Name: M-zodatoxin-Lt2b (M-ZDTX-Lt2b; Latarcin-2b, Ltc-2b; spiders, Arthropods, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Swiss_Prot Entry Q1ELU0]has a strong hemolytic activity against rabbit erythrocytes
Sequence Information.Function: Has antimicrobial activity against both Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, and the yeasts. Also has a strong hemolytic activity against rabbit erythrocytes. Causes paralysis, but is not lethal when injected into insect (Musca domestica) larvae.

Literature.Title: Latarcins, antimicrobial and cytolytic peptides from the venom of the spider Lachesana tarabaevi (Zodariidae) that exemplify biomolecular diversity.
Literature.Author: Kozlov SA, Vassilevski AA, Feofanov AV, Surovoy AY, Karpunin DV, Grishin EV.
